summary: This module implements a command‑line utility for fine‑tuning ControlNet models on custom image‑conditioned diffusion datasets. It handles argument parsing, dataset loading and preprocessing, model and scheduler setup, distributed training with Accelerate, periodic validation, checkpoint saving, and optional publishing to the Hugging Face Hub.
business_intent: Provide researchers and developers with an out‑of‑the‑box solution to adapt ControlNet for specific image‑to‑image generation tasks, accelerating model development and facilitating sharing of trained checkpoints and documentation.
